title: My Helvetica got stuck in your iPhone
content:
Shameless plug: <cite>Helvetica</cite> is available as a [digital download from iTunes](http://web.archive.org/web/20081022142642/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewMovie?id=284740710&s=143441), as of Tuesday. And guess which font film is already the the #1 documentary on iTunes? You got it. And it just knocked off <cite>27 Dresses</cite> for the #15 spot for all iTunes movies. Go design docs!

I wish I was at TypeCon!!!

Cheers,

-Gary

great, I actually bought the dvd of this today! I should have waited until I saw this thread and bought it on itunes.

Laz, the dvd is better... 90 minutes of extras. You get to see Spiekermann trash Arial.

David, there will actually be an announcement a week from now about the new film, stay tuned...

Cheers
“trash” doesn’t even begin to describe that section :-)
I just got back from seeing him trash it again at Typecon (as well as Arial Narrow). He’s extremely funny — if you get a chance to see him speak, don’t miss out.

He was in good form - I was glad to help out by sitting in the front row.

Cheers, Si
